text: Hazrat Syed Waris Shah (1722-1798) was a Sufi poet of Punjab (now in Pakistan).Dr Azhar H Khan, Hazrat Syed Waris Shah te unnha daa kalam (Punjabi:Hazrat Syed Waris Shah and his work) pub Lahore:Ittehad Press, 1995, p 11 He is famous for writing a beautiful poem Heer, about an old love story.Dr ST Mirza, 'Resistance themes in Punjabi Literature' Lahore, 1991 ==References== Category:1722 births Category:1798 deaths Category:Punjabi people Category:Asian Sufis
title: Waris Shah
